Welcome to  CCF's documentation!
================================
This is just a sample made to test tools that could be used to Document     about CCF.

Who is this Documentation for? 

This documentation is for anyone who wishes to know about :ref:`What is CCF <whatsccf>` and who wants to :ref:`set up CCF <settingup>` from the scratch.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Introduction

   :caption: Setting Up CCF
